discription.theory: HD display makes the display clear and true-to-life, with vivid colours ensuring smooth readability
This fashion smart watch will work on a single charge for about 8 days
The watch needs to be charged for 2 hours to reach 100%.
You cannot store Music in the watch, you can only control the music.
There is no volume control, however when connected to bt calling you can control the volume of the call
Supported Applications - Notifcations from all social media channels (Instagram, Whatsapp, Facebook)
